mapper.select: select * from configs where type = "VersionController" and configs.using = 1
select * from configs where type = "WebsiteService" and configs.using = 1 and value like CONCAT('%',#{sql},'%');
select * from configs as c where c.type = "WebsiteService" and c.name not in (select name from configs as z where z.type = "WebsiteService" and z.value like CONCAT('%',#{sql},'%') ) and c.using = 1;

update.foreach: update configs set value = #{item.value} where id = #{item.id} and type = #{item.type}
